DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : Primary - Validate new screen tool ( G8 ) . Secondary - Validate French version screen tool `` Vulnerable Elders Survey ( VES-13 ) '' . - Evaluate merit screen tool ( G8 VES-13 ) . - Assess screen tool specific population . - Assess number type intervention propose thorough geriatric assessment . - Compare two new tool ( G8 vs VES-13 ) . OUTLINE : This multicenter study . During first consultation , patient initial clinical evaluation questionnaire comprise G8 . They also complete self-questionnaire VES-13 . Within 30 day , patient thorough geriatric assessment , include quality life physical function , physician without access G8 VES-13 questionnaire . A blood specimen also collect . Information health status quality life collect medical record doctor 1 5 year .
